!?Inviting an attack.Since I decided my d4 pawn was a goner,I decided to castle.I had been half expecting for my opponent to sac on h7,but I decided that the worst I could do is draw with good play.The flow of the game changes and the rest is a good example of attack and defence

!! The only move!This covers both of Black's weak points at f6 and h6 simultaneously! Black would be mated if any other move was played.
The rest doesn't need much explanation.Black tries to trade pieces while White tries to rekindle his attack.
